Sono grato di aver potuto approfondire questo tema per fornire ai miei pazienti informazioni accurate e rassicuranti." (Translation: "I realized that there is no credible scientific evidence linking the MMR vaccine to autism. My research showed that studies that seemed to support this claim were fundamentally flawed and easily refutable. I'm glad I could delve into this topic to provide my patients with accurate and reassuring information.")
